A Little Queen's Huge Crown.name: A Little Queen's Huge Crown
A Little Queen's Huge Crown.description: An enormous crown that Chloe carries with her for the moment when she becomes a true queen. She aspires to become a queen whose power is as impressive and glamorous as the crown itself. As for where and how she found it... That's Chloe's secret!

skill.description: Increases damage by {{variable}} if the enemy is granted a barrier when the caster attacks with a Single Attack.

Abyssal Crown.name: Abyssal Crown
Abyssal Crown.description:
May those ruled by the crown walk the road of corruption forever.
- Witch Reinwood, hung high up on the stake

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to stun the enemy for 1 turn after attacking.

Alabastron.name: Alabastron
Alabastron.description: A bottle that contains a mystical fragrant oil infused with the power of Lunaris. It is said that if you perform a purifying ceremony with this, you will be granted life as a sacred being.

skill.description: Increases the caster's Effectiveness by 35%. Has a {{variable}} chance to increase Speed for 1 turn at the end of the caster's turn.

Alencinox's Wrath.name: Alencinox's Wrath
Alencinox's Wrath.description: The most vulnerable point on a Dragon's body is protected by their toughest scales. An accurate shot can kill a Dragon in an instant, but if you miss, their wrath will ensure you do not live long enough to regret it.

skill.description: Caster's Critical Hit Chance increases by {{variable}} whenever somebody's turn starts. Effect can only stack up to 20 times.

Alexa's Basket.name: Alexa's Basket
Alexa's Basket.description: A basket Alexa carries whenever she goes on a picnic with someone she wishes to become close to, containing everything necessary for a nice lunch in a beautiful forest. Just taking it along will elicit the joy of a pleasant picnic outing.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance each to grant increased Attack (Greater) and Critical Hit Chance to the caster for 1 turn at the start of the turn.

Ancient Dragon's Legacy.name: Ancient Dragon's Legacy
Ancient Dragon's Legacy.description: A magical tool that can be used to move to a golden chamber filled with rare goods and weaponry that lie sleeping. Once unlocked, the tool allows one to access the passage to the treasure chamber from anywhere.

skill.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 15%. After the caster uses a non-attack skill, has a {{variable}} chance to increase Critical Hit Damage for 2 turns. Can be activated once every 2 turns.

Bastion of Perlutia.name: Bastion of Perlutia
Bastion of Perlutia.description: A divine weapon passed down in the Perlutia family that may only be wielded by those born to be leaders. It chooses its master of its own will and rearranges its dark, hexagonal pieces to take the form most optimal for any situation. It was locked away for decades with no one to wield it, but finally, it has found a new master to bring it back into the world.

skill.description: At the start of battle, grants the ally with the highest Attack immunity for 1 turn and a barrier equivalent to {{variable}} of the caster's max Health for 2 turns.

Black Hand of the Goddess.name: Black Hand of the Goddess
Black Hand of the Goddess.description: A glove made to maximize an enhanced mage's magic. It draws out limitless power so that one may fight against many. However, because it was made without consideration of the harmful effects it may have upon the wearer, the wearer suffers from terrible side effects.

skill.description: The caster's Critical Hit Chance increases by {{variable}} at the start of battle. Effect decreases by {{variable}} every time the caster attacks, down to {{variable}}.

Blood-Seared Moon.name: Blood-Seared Moon
Blood-Seared Moon.description: It is said that when Lunaris's distorted light shines red, the rage and bloodlust of wild beasts and vampires is at its height.

skill.description: MISSING_TRANSLATION_KEY

Bloodstone.name: Bloodstone
Bloodstone.description: As I took a bite of the fruit, a red liquid spilled out. Instead of the copper smell of blood, the sweet scent of fruit emanated from it.

skill.description: After attacking, heals the ally with the lowest Health by {{variable}} of damage dealt.

Bloody Rose.name: Bloody Rose
Bloody Rose.description: "I will steal that power from him and bring my family back from the dead, then he too will learn how it feels to lose everything. Just watch me."

skill.description: Increases Effectiveness by {{variable}} on a Single Attack.

Border Coin.name: Border Coin
Border Coin.description:
"Heads, I'll pretend I didn't see anything and let you go free. But tails..."
Countless people have had their fortunes rely on this old gold coin.

skill.description: Increases Attack by {{variable}} after using a non-attack skill. Effect can only stack up to 3 times.

Celestine.name: Celestine
Celestine.description: A rare ore extracted from near the Sanctuary. Known as the Blessing of Diche, it has the power to infuse the wearer with the energy of life and is carried by royalty and some high-ranking priests.

skill.description: Heals the ally with the lowest Health by {{variable}} when using a basic skill.

Champion's Trophy.name: Champion's Trophy
Champion's Trophy.description: A glorious trophy given to the winner of the 7th Beach Volleyball Championship. The prize also included fifty meal coupons for use at the summer festival.

skill.description:
Increases Effectiveness by {{variable}}.
{{variable}} chance to stun the enemy for 1 turn after using a basic skill. This effect is not activated by a counterattack, Dual Attack, or extra attack.

Chatty.name: Chatty
Chatty.description: I was once the best mercenary in the world!! Before Serila... No, master trapped my soul inside this lantern.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to be granted a barrier for 2 turns when the caster's Health is 50% or less after being attacked. Barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Attack. Can be activated once every 2 turns.

Circus Fantasia.name: Circus Fantasia
Circus Fantasia.description: "I've mastered all kinds of acrobatics, so there's no performance beyond my abilities. Curious, aren't you? I'll invite you to see it for yourself!"

skill.description: Increases the caster's Effectiveness by {{variable}} at the start of battle. Effect decreases by {{variable}} every time the caster attacks, down to {{variable}}.

Cradle of Life.name: Cradle of Life
Cradle of Life.description: "They say Humans do not require meaning to exist; therefore, they are capable of becoming free. Does that mean a being born with a specific purpose can never truly be free?"

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to inflict a random debuff for 1 turn after using a basic skill (Decrease Attack, Decrease Hit Chance, Poison, or Bleeding).

Creation & Destruction.name: Creation & Destruction
Creation & Destruction.description: A scissor-like weapon that can be used as two separate swords, forged by the greatest blacksmith at Lilibet's request. In mockery of the official religion of Rekos, the blades are named after Cho and Mal, the demons of creation and destruction.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance for skill cooldown not to occur after using a skill.

Crimson Moon of Nightmares.name: Crimson Moon of Nightmares
Crimson Moon of Nightmares.description: It's hard to even venture a guess as to when this red marble was created. This marble creates the illusion that an immense full moon has risen in the sky, bringing forth the deep madness hidden within any who see it and trapping them in a never-ending hallucination.

skill.description: Increases Dual Attack chance by {{variable}}. When it is not the caster's turn, increases Effectiveness by {{variable}}.

Crown of Glory.name: Crown of Glory
Crown of Glory.description: In the national swordsmanship tournament held to appoint an elite knight to protect the first in line to the throne of Lefundos, the winner, crowned with a laurel wreath, was neither the son of a noble family nor a veteran knight but an ordinary young man, not even twenty years of age.

skill.description: Increases Defense by {{variable}}. Removes 5 Souls from the enemy when the caster suffers an attack that targets all allies.

Cruel Mischief.name: Cruel Mischief
Cruel Mischief.description: Once upon a time, a girl's parents asked a mage to transform their tomboyish daughter into an elegant lady. He fulfilled their request, and the parents were thrilled to see how obedient she had become, not realizing she had been replaced by a doll.

skill.description: Increases damage dealt in the Hall of Trials by {{variable}}.

Dignus Orb.name: Dignus Orb
Dignus Orb.description: "Whenever times are hard, I just look up to the sky, and it shows me the way forward."

skill.description: Grants a barrier equivalent to {{variable}} of Attack for 2 turns when the caster uses a non-attack skill and increases the damage of the next attack by 15%.

Doctor's Bag.name: Doctor's Bag
Doctor's Bag.description: A bag filled with medications that Ray made himself. Most illnesses and injuries can be treated by the medications within the bag.

skill.description: Dispels one debuff from all allies and recovers {{variable}} of each ally's max Health after using non-attack skills 3 times. Can only be activated once per battle.

Double-Edged Decrescent.name: Double-Edged Decrescent
Double-Edged Decrescent.description: "Were the trusty sword on your shoulder to slip even slightly, it could slit your throat. The same is true of people—the closer you keep them, the more easily they're able to harm you."

skill.description: After attacking with a Single Attack, increases the caster's Attack by {{variable}}, with a {{variable}} chance to silence the enemy for 1 turn. Increased Attack effect can stack up to three times.

Draco Plate.name: Draco Plate
Draco Plate.description:
"Isn't it ironic? That Dragon's skin and bones are now used to make armor to protect the very Dragon Knights of Wintenberg it cursed as it died."
The queen laughed as she wiped the blood from her armor.

skill.description: Increases Critical Hit Damage by {{variable}} while decreasing damage suffered from critical hits by {{variable}}. When more than one similar effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

Durandal.name: Durandal
Durandal.description: The soft light emitted by the sword shields its owner from all injuries.

skill.description: When the caster's Health is 75% or less after being attacked, Combat Readiness increases by {{variable}}.

Dux Noctis.name: Dux Noctis
Dux Noctis.description: "According to my mother, this necklace holds a wolf's power. That's why it shines brighter on nights you can see the moon clearly. It means the wolf will soon begin its relentless chase."

skill.description: Increases Attack of the caster by {{variable}} when an ally makes a critical hit. Effect can only stack up to 8 times.

Elbris Ritual Sword.name: Elbris Ritual Sword
Elbris Ritual Sword.description: A ceremonial sword handed down by the Elves for thousands of years, the blade is infused with several springs of magic. The person who owns this sword becomes the king of Elves.

skill.description: Has a {{variable}} chance to counterattack when an ally except for the caster is attacked.

Etica's Scepter.name: Etica's Scepter
Etica's Scepter.description: When the empire is in its greatest peril, the exiled princess, Etica, will return with the five spirits to take back the royal hall and call down a rain of repentance to save the devastated world.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to decrease skill cooldown by 1 turn at the beginning of the turn.

Fairy Tale for a Nightmare.name: Fairy Tale for a Nightmare
Fairy Tale for a Nightmare.description: A girl with a bouncy blue skirt dashes from place to place, just like a rabbit. Where could she be going? Perhaps the answer lies within a fairy tale.

skill.description: If the caster attacks when it's not their turn, deals {{variable}} fixed damage to the target.

Guiding Light.name: Guiding Light
Guiding Light.description: The bright star shining within the dark crystal resembles the North Star, and is determined to guide people through chaotic times.

skill.description: At the start of battle, grants stealth for 1 turn. At the end of the caster's turn, has a {{variable}} chance to grant stealth for 2 turns. Stealth granted at the end of the caster's turn can be activated once every 2 turns.

Holy Sacrifice.name: Holy Sacrifice
Holy Sacrifice.description:
The Statue of Grace is given to whichever knight wins the Goddess's favor and will save them from death once before shattering to pieces.
Written by Barrett [Treasures of the Sacred Kingdom, 15p]

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to be revived with 25% Health and granted a barrier for 1 turn after dying. Barrier strength is proportional to the caster's max Health. Can only be activated once.

Idol's Cheer.name: Idol's Cheer
Idol's Cheer.description: I believe that music can change the world. Because it changed me!

skill.description: When attacked, increases Combat Readiness of the ally with the highest Attack by {{variable}}.

Iron Fan.name: Iron Fan
Iron Fan.description: "Ladies use fans for many purposes: hiding smiles, expressing feelings indirectly, and of course, eliminating enemies."

skill.description: Damage dealt increases by {{variable}} when attacking an Ice elemental target.

Junkyard Dog.name: Junkyard Dog
Junkyard Dog.description: A weapon created to embody the ability of the Outrage. It is a combination of the Fireseal and the Flashing Tooth, which is one of the Sacred Treasures, originally possessed by the Conclave on Sol's home planet.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to burn enemy for 2 turns after using basic skill.

Justice for All.name: Justice for All
Justice for All.description: A gauntlet made the year the first member of the Sharon family was knighted. It represents the pursuit of justice to be shared by all who follow the Goddess and the kingdom, rather than just for the sake of oneself.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to grant the caster a random buff for 2 turns at the end of the turn (Increase Attack, Defense, Speed, or Critical Hit Chance, Barrier, Immunity, Continuous Heal, or Critical Hit Resistance). Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

Knowledge Seed.name: Knowledge Seed
Knowledge Seed.description: A capsule created in preparation for the final days of Politis's home planet, Paradia. It's a cache of Paradia's heritage that includes relics of their technology, knowledge, culture, and art so that their legacy can live on even if their planet disappears.

skill.description: Upon receiving lethal damage, has a {{variable}} chance to grant all allies except for the caster a random buff for 2 turns (Increase Attack (Greater), Increase Defense, Increase Evasion, Immunity, or Increase Critical Hit Resistance). Can only be activated once per battle.

Last Teatime.name: Last Teatime
Last Teatime.description:
"You finally found what you wanted, my lady."
"Stop imposing on me, you fool."
Oblivious to the events that would soon unfold before them, Baal smiled to himself when Sezan found the spell for the forbidden magic ceremony.

skill.description: When using an attack that targets all enemies, increases damage dealt by {{variable}}, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease skill cooldown by 1 turn.

Manica of Control.name: Manica of Control
Manica of Control.description: Sez's arm was modified and weaponized as part of an experiment in the past. After he escaped the facility, it grew more and more powerful until he could no longer control it. Sez considered this power a curse and used clothes and gloves to conceal his arm. After coming to realize this, the members of the Phantom CIC made him a special glove to help him control its power.

skill.description: Increases Hit Chance by {{variable}} and Critical Hit Chance by 15% on a Single Attack.

Manifu.name: Manifu
Manifu.description: A spirit that controls a body with no soul, instead of a doll. The body now contains the soul of a magician who failed in their attempt to harness Eternal Magic.

skill.description: MISSING_TRANSLATION_KEY

Merciless Glutton.name: Merciless Glutton
Merciless Glutton.description: This blade's name is derived from the brutal scar it leaves behind, which makes it appear as though the victim's skin was torn by the bite of a giant beast. In order to effectively control the blade, a strength that goes beyond the realm of Humans is needed.

skill.description: Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 15% when an enemy is defeated, with a {{variable}} chance to increase Effectiveness for 2 turns. Can only be activated once per skill.

Ms. Confille.name: Ms. Confille
Ms. Confille.description: A long-range rifle owned by Elphelt Valentine. It is a special weapon that allows the bearer to change magic into bullets, and thus it allows any ordinary person to use powerful attacks.

skill.description: Has a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense of the enemy for 1 turn after a Single Attack. This effect is not activated by a counterattack, Dual Attack, or extra attack.

Necro & Undine.name: Necro & Undine
Necro & Undine.description: Two sentient wings on Dizzy's back. When attacking, the green wing becomes Necro, a grim reaper, and the blue wing becomes Undine, an angel. Though their personalities often clash, both of them consider Dizzy's safety their highest priority.

skill.description: Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by {{variable}} after using an attack that targets all enemies. This effect is not activated by a counterattack, Dual Attack, or extra attack.

Noble Oath.name: Noble Oath
Noble Oath.description: An emblem given to members of Ezera's Orders after they pledge to dedicate their lives to the Goddess. Those given to knights resemble an escutcheon, while those given to priests resemble a rosary.

skill.description: As Health decreases, Defense and Effect Resistance increase by up to {{variable}}.

Otherworldly Machinery.name: Otherworldly Machinery
Otherworldly Machinery.description: For the people of Orbis, Yuna's cellphone is a peculiar item that they couldn't understand.

skill.description: Increases damage of attacks that target all enemies by {{variable}}.

Proof of Valor.name: Proof of Valor
Proof of Valor.description: "Though courage and daring may not be visible to mortal eyes, this insignia will act as proof of yours. From now on, everyone you meet shall know of your valor."

skill.description: Decreases damage taken by {{variable}}. Effect decreases by {{variable}} with each attack suffered, down to {{variable}}. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. This artifact can only apply to one Hero within a party.

Reingar's Special Drink.name: Reingar's Special Drink
Reingar's Special Drink.description: A drink specially made in Reingar. With its pretty color and sweet scent, this drink is great for relaxation. They say this drink also enhances concentration, memorization, and judgment, but this hasn't been verified yet.

skill.description: When attacking all enemies, has a {{variable}} chance to inflict additional damage after attacking. Additional damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

Rhianna & Luciella.name: Rhianna & Luciella
Rhianna & Luciella.description:
You're today's target. I'll let you know now that there's nowhere to run.
- Moon Assassins, Rhianna and Luciella

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to be granted an extra turn at the end of the turn. Can be activated once per turn.

Rise of a Monarch.name: Rise of a Monarch
Rise of a Monarch.description: "I will not forget—I am now the owner of a spear whose fate has been determined; of a coffin that will be filled by another." On that day, the heaviest weight in the world fell upon the shoulders of the bravest soul in Wintenberg.

skill.description: Increases Defense by 10%. At the end of the turn, grants a barrier equivalent to {{variable}} of the caster's max Health for 2 turns to the ally except for the caster with the lowest Health. This Artifact's skill effect can only apply to one Hero within a team.

Rod of Amaryllis.name: Rod of Amaryllis
Rod of Amaryllis.description: Everyone who fights for the salvation of the world will have the divine protection of the Goddess.

skill.description: Heals the ally with the lowest Health by {{variable}} after using a non-attack skill.

Samsara Prayer Beads.name: Samsara Prayer Beads
Samsara Prayer Beads.description: "With this...will I grow stronger?" Old prayer beads of unknown origin passed down since long ago. It is said that depending on the nature of the wearer, it can grant partial control of natural power.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance each to grant increased Effect Resistance and Defense for 1 turn at the end of the turn.

Secret Art - Storm Sword.name: Secret Art - Storm Sword
Secret Art - Storm Sword.description: A book passed down through generations of Celine's family. It contains the secret to a form of sword art that allows one to channel the energy within their body to strike down their foes with lightning speed.

skill.description: Has a {{variable}} chance to grant increased Attack to the caster for 1 turn when an enemy uses a non-attack skill. Can only be activated once per turn.

Shepherd of the Hollow.name: Shepherd of the Hollow
Shepherd of the Hollow.description: "To those fools who cannot be redeemed: kneel down, despair, and obey." Those who fell to his sword soon lost themselves and rose up as Dust Walkers.

skill.description: Increases Evasion by {{variable}}. Damage dealt increases by {{variable}} if the caster's Health is below 25% when attacking.

Shimadra Staff.name: Shimadra Staff
Shimadra Staff.description:
Let's end this together.
- The Great Fallen Priest, Shimadra

skill.description: Increases Effect Resistance of all allies by 20% and the effect of healing received by all allies by {{variable}}. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name. When more than one increased healing effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

Sigurd Scythe.name: Sigurd Scythe
Sigurd Scythe.description: As the moonlight revealed a figure holding a scythe, the astonished onlookers exclaimed "the God of Death has descended!"

skill.description: When the caster's Health is 50% or less, increases Attack by 25% and after attacking, absorbs {{variable}} of the damage dealt as Health.

Snow Crystal.name: Snow Crystal
Snow Crystal.description: The specialty of Pathfinder Village, made of compressed ice that is kept from melting with a magic spell. Due to the mysterious, beautiful light they give off, they're often used to make lamps or other decorations.

skill.description: Increases Effect Resistance by 20%. When the caster suffers a non-critical hit, increases Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. Can only be activated once per turn.

Song of Stars.name: Song of Stars
Song of Stars.description: As the strings start to vibrate, the starlight illuminates her.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance for an enemy to become targeted for 2 turns after a single attack.

Spirit's Breath.name: Spirit's Breath
Spirit's Breath.description:
Through them... I can feel it. The pain and agony in this world...
It is said that only a few Shaman of Rekos can hear the Spirits' whispers.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to decrease skill cooldown by 1 turn when using a non-attack skill.

Star Piercer.name: Star Piercer
Star Piercer.description:
You're overestimating that armor. I could pierce it if I wanted to.
- Star Prosecutor, Ayla

skill.description: MISSING_TRANSLATION_KEY

Stella Harpa.name: Stella Harpa
Stella Harpa.description: An ancient relic of the Shandra Empire handed down between the High Priests and Priestesses of Constella. It is said that when the harp is played while singing, stars fall from the night sky and fireflies soar upward.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to dispel one debuff from an ally when attacked.

Sword of Ezera.name: Sword of Ezera
Sword of Ezera.description:
"Because the color and shape is different to the holy sword wielded by the real life Ezeran legend..."
The final part of the etching on the sword's hilt has been lost to time, but a mysterious force can still be felt flowing through the blade.

skill.description: Decreases damage suffered by the caster from Elite or Boss monsters by {{variable}}. When more than one similar effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

Sword of Holy Light.name: Sword of Holy Light
Sword of Holy Light.description: The soft light emitted by the sword shields its owner from all injuries.

skill.description: MISSING_TRANSLATION_KEY

Sword of Judgment.name: Sword of Judgment
Sword of Judgment.description: "If you truly are innocent, then the Goddess will save you from my sword." Whether it is blood or the dark red of rose petals that falls in that next moment, it is unclear.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to attack again with a basic skill when the target survives a Single Attack. Can only be activated once per turn.

Sword of Summer Twilight.name: Sword of Summer Twilight
Sword of Summer Twilight.description: A sword given to Vildred by the eastern swordsman who taught him swordsmanship. It glows faintly when moonlight strikes its surface. It is known as the Summer Sword, one of the four swords crafted long, long ago.

skill.description: When using a skill that targets all enemies, penetrates the target's Defense by {{variable}}. When defeating an enemy with a skill that targets all enemies, increases Combat Readiness of all allies except for the caster by 10%.

Time Matter.name: Time Matter
Time Matter.description: A source of power that Guardian Kazran wields that controls time. It can bring forth a time in the past that no one can remember.

skill.description: Reduces skill cooldown by 1 turn when an enemy is killed by an attack and increases the damage of the next attack by {{variable}}. Can only be activated once per skill.

Torn Sleeve.name: Torn Sleeve
Torn Sleeve.description: A torn sleeve out of which various weapons appear as though they are prosthetic limbs. She never has explained how she manages to fit so many things up there.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to inflict bleeding for 2 turns after a single attack.

Touch of Rekos.name: Touch of Rekos
Touch of Rekos.description: An artifact handed down by the god Rekos after the Spirit Shrine was built. It is said that this item, containing the power of a god, is bestowed upon the most qualified shaman.

skill.description: Recovers the Health of all allies by {{variable}} after being attacked. This effect can only be activated once per turn. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

Uberius's Tooth.name: Uberius's Tooth
Uberius's Tooth.description: Treasure of the Wintenberg royal family made from the remains of wicked dragon Uberius. It's said to be capable of ripping dragon scale armor.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to inflict additional damage after a Single Attack. Additional damage increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

Unfading Memories.name: Unfading Memories
Unfading Memories.description: Diene always kept a dried forget-me-not in her pocket watch, shimmering with bright blue light as if it were picked only a day earlier.

skill.description: Heals all allies by {{variable}} after using a non-attack skill.

Unseen Observer.name: Unseen Observer
Unseen Observer.description: A mobile data device created just for Flan. It supports hologram displays and allows Flan to access Politia's information network anytime, anywhere.

skill.description: After the caster uses a non-attack skill, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by {{variable}} and acquires 10 Souls. Souls can only be acquired once.

Violet Talisman.name: Violet Talisman
Violet Talisman.description:
As long as you believe in victory, the light of hope shall never fade. Remember that, my son. Our family's legacy now rests on your shoulders.
- Violet's Father

skill.description: Increases Attack by {{variable}} and Evasion by {{variable}} at the start of every turn. Each effect can stack up to 3 times, and resets at the start of battle.

Wall of Order.name: Wall of Order
Wall of Order.description: A device that can restrict access to certain districts under the authority of the police. Unless granted access from the authorities, no one can enter.

skill.description: At the start of the turn, for each buff granted to an enemy, has a {{variable}} chance to grant the caster increased Attack (Greater) for 1 turn. After using an attack that targets all enemies, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 10%. This effect is not activated by a counterattack, Dual Attack, or extra attack.

Wind Rider.name: Wind Rider
Wind Rider.description: Famously known as the Phantom Wind, Rinak would sneak into the mansions of the rich with ghost-like stealth and vanish with their most expensive possessions.

skill.description: When the caster defeats an enemy with an attack, casts stealth for 1 turn and increases Attack of the caster by {{variable}} for 1 turn at the start of their next turn.

Adamant Shield.name: Adamant Shield
Adamant Shield.description:
That damn shield can't be penetrated by anything. I guarantee you, cause even my sword couldn't.
- Star Fencer Ayla

skill.description: Decreases Critical Hit Damage received by all allies by {{variable}}. When more than one similar effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

Ambrote.name: Ambrote
Ambrote.description: After a final prayer, she took her bow made from the branches of the World Tree and leaped onto the battlefield full of death, wishing to restore the world in the belief that all things will be born anew.

skill.description: Increases damage dealt by basic skill by {{variable}}.

Andre's Crossbow.name: Andre's Crossbow
Andre's Crossbow.description: "This crossbow has been modified to my own personal specifications. As long as I'm using this, there's no target I cannot hit."

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to remove 3 Souls from the enemy when the caster attacks with a Single Attack.

Aurius.name: Aurius
Aurius.description: Legendary hero Knight Commander Rowell's tower shield.

skill.description: Increases Defense of all allies by 10%, and takes {{variable}} of the damage suffered by them. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name. When more than one damage distribution effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

Barthez's Orbuculum.name: Barthez's Orbuculum
Barthez's Orbuculum.description: There is no need to ask me about the future. Now that you are my master, everything will unfold according to your desires. The future is in your hands.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to decrease damage received when attacked by 50%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

Bloody Warhammer.name: Bloody Warhammer
Bloody Warhammer.description: "I heard that weapon sucks up blood, don't you think it hosts an evil spirit?"

skill.description: MISSING_TRANSLATION_KEY

Card of Small Miracles.name: Card of Small Miracles
Card of Small Miracles.description: A New Year's card with a picture of Arky pulling a sled over a starry sky, on his way to grant the wishes of the people of Ritania. No matter how much time has passed, this card will help you remember your precious memories of that day.

skill.description: Increases Attack and Defense of all allies by {{variable}}. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name.

Celestial Spear.name: Celestial Spear
Celestial Spear.description: This spear once wielded by the hero Nerendis is said to be powerful enough to pierce through the sky.

skill.description: MISSING_TRANSLATION_KEY

Crimson Seed.name: Crimson Seed
Crimson Seed.description: A token in the shape of the small flame emblem of Meldrec, used as proof of friendly relations and to show that an outsider has been granted passage through Meldrec by the great chief.

skill.description: Has a {{variable}} chance to dispel one debuff after being attacked. Can be activated once per turn.

Dust Devil.name: Dust Devil
Dust Devil.description: "Once this long fight is over, will everything go back to the way it was?" mused the hero of the Dejurak desert with a deep sigh of anger.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to attack again with a basic skill when the target survives a basic skill attack. Can only be activated once per turn.

El's Fist.name: El's Fist
El's Fist.description:
While holding this gauntlet, you can destroy anything you touch, as if it had never even existed!
- Guard Maid, El

skill.description: As Health decreases, Attack and Speed increase by up to {{variable}}.

Elyha's Knife.name: Elyha's Knife
Elyha's Knife.description: Whenever Elyha, the leader of the Black Fog Company, wielded a knife, it got darker with blood and more brutal every time.

skill.description: Penetrates Defense by {{variable}} when attacking an enemy not at max Health.

Eternus.name: Eternus
Eternus.description: "An eternal promise of perpetual confinement. Through endless cycles of death and rebirth, you will be intertwined." According to myth, the cursed archmage Heindel has spent thousands of years traveling the world to find a way to free himself from the ring's domination.

skill.description: Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by {{variable}} when a debuffed ally except for the caster starts a turn.

Flower Shower.name: Flower Shower
Flower Shower.description: The perfect magical tool for a girl who loves attention. Her sudden appearance in a shower of petals and a flash of light is like a dream, though for many it is more akin to a scene from a nightmare.

skill.description: Increases Effectiveness by {{variable}}. When an enemy is defeated, increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns.

Golden Cocoa Cookie.name: Golden Cocoa Cookie
Golden Cocoa Cookie.description: A dessert made for the festival by a famous chef using special golden cocoa beans that can only be found in the forests near Perland. It is famous for its sweet flavor compared to normal cocoa.

skill.description: Increases Hit Chance and Effect Resistance of all allies by {{variable}}. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name.

Hell Cutter.name: Hell Cutter
Hell Cutter.description:
Look at this saw... isn't it awesome?
- Notorious Lunatic, Ralakia

skill.description: Caster's Attack and Critical Hit Chance increase by {{variable}} whenever somebody's turn ends. Effect is removed after the caster attacks.

Hilag Lance.name: Hilag Lance
Hilag Lance.description: As she lifted her lance, a cry burst out from behind her. She believed she would soon be able to overthrow the Archdemon. "If I cannot do it, Goddess, give me the power to fight on forever."

skill.description: Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by {{variable}} after an ally except for the caster is attacked by a single attack.

Iela Violin.name: Iela Violin
Iela Violin.description: No matter how much power or darkness one wields, they're just a part of the audience. Iela started to play the violin and her melody touched the hearts of all that heard it. Even the genius mage who was only interested in fighting was moved.

skill.description: Has a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff from the enemy after attacking.

Infinity Basket.name: Infinity Basket
Infinity Basket.description: Now, put your most expensive possession in this basket - it doubles! Put in two? Quadruples! This isn't a scam, trust me!

skill.description: For the duration of the caster's turn, increases Dual Attack chance of all allies except for the caster by {{variable}} and increases Attack of all allies except for the caster by 20%.

Kal'adra.name: Kal'adra
Kal'adra.description: A cursed weapon created by the fallen priest, Sestia. It causes a mental breakdown in the target by reminding them of their most painful memories. Even ages later, when fallen priests have sided with the Covenant, use of this mask is banned.

skill.description: Increases damage dealt by {{variable}} if the target is debuffed when the caster attacks.

Love Potion.name: Love Potion
Love Potion.description: It is said to be a magic potion of love, but in reality it is a potion that makes people honest about their innermost feelings.

skill.description: Increases the effect of all healing received by allies by {{variable}}. When more than one similar effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

Magaraha's Tome.name: Magaraha's Tome
Magaraha's Tome.description: An ancient book written by a great mage. It contains all of Magaraha's magical research. Due to its complicated content and massive volume, even those ambitious enough to try to read it all had to give up after turning only a few pages.

skill.description: Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by {{variable}} after using a non-attack skill.

Midnight Bloom.name: Midnight Bloom
Midnight Bloom.description: A type of firework used at the Full Moon Festival Afterparty. Its blooms vary from huge explosions that illuminate the entire night sky to small bursts shaped like delightful plants and animals.

skill.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance of all allies by {{variable}}. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name.

Moonlight Dreamblade.name: Moonlight Dreamblade
Moonlight Dreamblade.description: "Whether you take the path before you or not, it's all your choice to make," the White Shining Blade's voice whispered in my mind.

skill.description: Increases Evasion by {{variable}}. After successfully evading, the caster is granted increased Attack for 1 turn.

New Year Cookies.name: New Year Cookies
New Year Cookies.description: Arky heard that at the end of the year if you wear a red hat with white fur, you should give out presents to make people happy! Since Arky's such a generous Guardian, I will give Master a cookie! Just for today!

skill.description:
Recovers Health of all allies by 10% at the start of the battle. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.
The skill effect of this Artifact does not increase when enhanced.

One Year of Gratitude.name: One Year of Gratitude
One Year of Gratitude.description: Orbis has completed one long orbit around Ilryos. To convey their feelings of gratitude to Heirs for protecting Orbis all that time, Ras brings a gift, wrapped by Arky, and a letter, written by Mercedes.

skill.description: Increases the EXP acquired by Heroes in the team by 10%. When more than one Artifact that increases EXP is equipped, only the strongest effect is applied, and this effect will not be applied when used via a Supporter. The skill effect of this Artifact does not increase when enhanced.

Portrait of the Saviors.name: Portrait of the Saviors
Portrait of the Saviors.description: A portrait featuring the faces of the heroes who vanished after saving Orbis, drawn from Ras's memory by a famous Ezeran artist.

skill.description: Increases damage dealt by {{variable}} if the target's Health is 50% or more when the caster attacks.

Radiant Forever.name: Radiant Forever
Radiant Forever.description: A flash appears with creation; a flare passes by with death. This crystal, created by a consolidation of all light within life, is said to have immense power.

skill.description: When using a skill that targets all enemies, increases damage dealt against Elite or Boss monsters by {{variable}}.

Rainbow Scale.name: Rainbow Scale
Rainbow Scale.description: According to legend, a handful of Merpeople have rainbow-colored scales, which possess very powerful healing properties, capable even of bringing back the dead.

skill.description: Increases Effectiveness and Effect Resistance of all allies by {{variable}}. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name.

Rosa Hargana.name: Rosa Hargana
Rosa Hargana.description: Gun mage Amber Rose was an expert in lightweight magic and sharpshooting. Her magic bullets never missed, even when aimed at her own lover.

skill.description: Increases Dual Attack Chance by {{variable}} and increases Attack by 30% when it is not the caster's turn.

Santa Muerte.name: Santa Muerte
Santa Muerte.description: There was nothing that Haste's scythe could not slay. The peaceful darkness could not stand in its way, nor even could life and death, until eventually he slayed even his own humanity.

skill.description: Decreases Combat Readiness of the enemy by {{variable}} after a single attack if the enemy is an Earth elemental.

Sashe Ithanes.name: Sashe Ithanes
Sashe Ithanes.description: This is the Sashe Ithanes. It is a flame that will shake the world on its axis, that will destroy people, cities, kingdoms, even dreams. Take it, and in my name bring an end to everything.

skill.description: Increases Combat Readiness of all allies by {{variable}} when the enemy is defeated. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name.

Sepulcrum.name: Sepulcrum
Sepulcrum.description:
"All those who wander shall embrace death under my blade. My sword will be the gravestone of sinners."

- Mary the Benevolent Punisher

skill.description: Decreases damage taken by {{variable}}. Effect increases by {{variable}} with each attack suffered, and can stack up to 3 times. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. The effect resets at the beginning of the caster's turn.

Shepherds of Chaos.name: Shepherds of Chaos
Shepherds of Chaos.description: New kinds of Unknown that came to Orbis through Chaos Gates. Their appearance and traits differ from that of the Unknown that previously appeared in Ritania. Most are acting under someone's command, and a few appear to possess some intelligence.

skill.description: As Health decreases, Evasion and Defense increase by up to {{variable}}.

Silver Rain.name: Silver Rain
Silver Rain.description: After her shurikens poured down from the sky, the alley was awash with blood.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to increase Attack of the ally except for the caster with the highest Attack for 2 turns when the caster uses a non-attack skill.

Sira-Ren.name: Sira-Ren
Sira-Ren.description: This rare magical flower blooms from the corpse of a Human who possessed incredible magic power. It quickly withers away unless it is constantly being infused with powerful Mana. Few have been lucky enough to witness such a sight.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to inflict a random debuff for 1 turn after attacking (Decrease Attack, Decrease Hit Chance, Silence, Sleep, or Poison).

Spooky Solayu Stories.name: Spooky Solayu Stories
Spooky Solayu Stories.description: A book written by a ghost story aficionado. The first story features a sad little ghost girl who appears within a hazy beam of light.

skill.description: Increases Hit Chance and Effectiveness of all allies by {{variable}}. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name.

Steadfast Gatekeeper.name: Steadfast Gatekeeper
Steadfast Gatekeeper.description: "This sword was forged not to take lives but to keep those within our castle safe. Never forget that our utmost duty is to prevent even a single drop of blood from being shed inside these walls."

skill.description: Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by {{variable}} when attacked by a skill that targets all allies.

Strak Gauntlet.name: Strak Gauntlet
Strak Gauntlet.description:
When the eclipse began, those small gloves started to spew fire and engulf my whole body. The spirit inside the gloves had woken up, and we were able to defeat the Archdemon.
- Heir Aki

skill.description: Effect Resistance increases by {{variable}} when the caster's Health is 50% or more. When Health is less than 50%, the effect is halved.

Succubus Mirror.name: Succubus Mirror
Succubus Mirror.description: Be careful not to be seduced by the face in the mirror.

skill.description: MISSING_TRANSLATION_KEY

Tagehel's Ancient Book.name: Tagehel's Ancient Book
Tagehel's Ancient Book.description: A book written in the characters of the fallen Kingdom of Tagehel. Researchers are working hard to discover the meaning and principles behind the characters and unlock the mysterious power they hold.

skill.description: Acquires {{variable}} Souls at the start of the first battle.

Tear of the Desert.name: Tear of the Desert
Tear of the Desert.description: A jewel insignia that is made of Peridot found only in the nearby desert of Savara and granted exclusively to a few credited mercenaries by Basar himself. Adventurers of the desert covet it for its mystical blue glow that grows brighter as a sandstorm approaches.

skill.description: After using an attack that targets all enemies, increases Attack of the caster by {{variable}}. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.

To a New World.name: To a New World
To a New World.description: Ras and the Heirs have been invited to a banquet in celebration of Ezeran Foundation Day. As they leave the hardships they suffered behind them, they raise their glasses in anticipation of a new, peaceful world.

skill.description: Increases the EXP acquired by Heroes in the team by 15%. When more than one Artifact that increases EXP is equipped, only the strongest effect is applied, and this effect will not be applied when used via a Supporter. The skill effect of this Artifact does not increase when enhanced.

Water's Origin.name: Water's Origin
Water's Origin.description:
Wherever this talisman is, I will be too. To bring safety from storms, freedom from illness, life where once there was only ruin.
- Shaman Cizette

skill.description: Recovers 8% Health and increases Combat Readiness by {{variable}} after receiving damage equivalent to 20% or more of max Health when attacked.

Wondrous Potion Vial.name: Wondrous Potion Vial
Wondrous Potion Vial.description:
A potion of love, or a potion of eternal youth. Only one of each exists in this world. Which do you choose?
- A Senior Fellow of the Alchemy Society, Pei

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to dispel one debuff from an ally at the beginning of the turn.

XVI. The Tower.name: XVI. The Tower
XVI. The Tower.description: After suffering the pain of deceit and betrayal, the pillars of her heart collapsed, and as she escaped the prison of passion, she embraced the freedom of destruction. However, her greed is building a new tower that will imprison her once more.

skill.description: Deals {{variable}} fixed damage to the target after attacking.

Alsacian Spear.name: Alsacian Spear
Alsacian Spear.description: It is said that this spear contains the souls of the spirits who protect the forest, and grants strong protection to those who wield it.

skill.description: After attacking with a Single Attack, decreases Combat Readiness of the target by {{variable}}.

Ancient Sheath.name: Ancient Sheath
Ancient Sheath.description: This magical sheath is said to keep any blade from losing its sharpness.

skill.description: Increases damage dealt by basic skill by {{variable}}.

Aqua Rose.name: Aqua Rose
Aqua Rose.description: This rose of eternal beauty grants great magical power to the possessor.

skill.description: 50% chance to grant a barrier to the caster equivalent to {{variable}} of max Health for 2 turns after being attacked. Can only be granted once every 2 turns.

Ascending Axe.name: Ascending Axe
Ascending Axe.description:
The swing of his axe was unstoppable; his enemies becoming an ever-growing pile of corpses.
Written by Reingar Media Club [Special Edition: Testimony of Ancient Weapons 6, 44p]

skill.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance of the caster by {{variable}} after making a critical hit. Effect can only stack up to 3 times.

Atma's Portal.name: Atma's Portal
Atma's Portal.description: By going through that door, you can turn back time. It may be for a brief moment, but it's enough to gain momentum in a fight.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to decrease skill cooldown of all allies by 1 turn at the start of the battle.

Butterfly Mandolin.name: Butterfly Mandolin
Butterfly Mandolin.description: A mandolin used by Ludo, a pure-voiced minstrel. If you play it, you can see an illusion of butterflies made of light dancing.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to be granted an extra turn at the end of the next turn when attacked.

Cursed Compass.name: Cursed Compass
Cursed Compass.description:
Careful, it's a monster. Who knows what could happen if we go in the direction the compass is pointing.
- Adventurer Laurelai

skill.description: Increases Effectiveness by {{variable}} for 1 turn at the start of the battle.

Daydream Joker.name: Daydream Joker
Daydream Joker.description: Did you enjoy the world I showed you? Was it satisfying? Now, pay the price with your life.

skill.description: Increases damage dealt by {{variable}} of the enemy's max Health when attacking.

Devil's Brand.name: Devil's Brand
Devil's Brand.description:
As long as this brand is with you, the Devil will continue to protect you.
- Cult Enforcer Ebarak

skill.description: Increases Effect Resistance of all allies by {{variable}} at the start of the turn. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.

Egg of Delusion.name: Egg of Delusion
Egg of Delusion.description: A dark egg containing demonic energy. Nobody knows what it may contain inside.

skill.description: Increases Defense by {{variable}} when Health is 50% or more.

Envoy's Pipe.name: Envoy's Pipe
Envoy's Pipe.description: Look carefully at the smoke that rises from the pipe--you'll see within whether you're destined for paradise or hell.

skill.description: Decreases damage received by {{variable}} if the caster's Health is 50% or less when attacked. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

Exorcist's Tonfa.name: Exorcist's Tonfa
Exorcist's Tonfa.description: A powerful tonfa capable of smashing bones and splitting flesh. They say that when the wielders of this weapon die, their souls are bound to it.

skill.description: Increases damage dealt by {{variable}} if the target's Health is 50% or more when the caster attacks.

Forest Totem.name: Forest Totem
Forest Totem.description: A totem deep within the forest. Make a wish before it, and if you hear the clear ringing of a bell, your wish will come true.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to grant continuous healing for 2 turns when attacked. Can only be activated once every 2 turns.

Goblin's Lamp.name: Goblin's Lamp
Goblin's Lamp.description: If you allow yourself to be seduced by the faint light floating upon the lake, the demon in the water will reach out for you.

skill.description: At the start of battle, recovers Health of the ally with the lowest Health by {{variable}}. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

Grail of Blood.name: Grail of Blood
Grail of Blood.description: What wishes may be granted by this Death Goblet that holds the blood of so many victims?

skill.description: Recovers Health equal to {{variable}} of the caster's Attack at the start of the turn. Effect is increased by 50% when the caster's Health is 30% or less.

Labyrinth Cube.name: Labyrinth Cube
Labyrinth Cube.description: A strange relic that was found in the mysterious maze of Farche Frontier. With mysterious light emitting from it, it has the power to distort space with impact.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to increase the caster's Combat Readiness by 15% at the end of the enemy's turn.

Mighty Yaksha.name: Mighty Yaksha
Mighty Yaksha.description: If you really want to be strong, risk your life and challenge me.

skill.description: Increases Attack and Defense by {{variable}} when Health is 50% or more.

Oath Key.name: Oath Key
Oath Key.description:
A key made in honor of the heroes who defeated the ancient monster, Nankuda, engraved with their oath to protect the world.
- Philosopher Izet

skill.description: Increases Hit Chance by {{variable}}.

Prophetic Candlestick.name: Prophetic Candlestick
Prophetic Candlestick.description: It is said that you can see into the future by lighting a candle, putting it on this candlestick, and looking into the flame.

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to reduce cooldown by 1 turn when attacked. Can be activated once per turn.

Ranon's Memorandum.name: Ranon's Memorandum
Ranon's Memorandum.description: A memorandum that contains all the records of magic researched by Ranon, the Mage. However, a spell is cast to show different content every time it's opened, so one must disable the spell to read the real content.

skill.description: Increases Speed by {{variable}} after attacking. Can stack up to 10 times.

Ruby Essence.name: Ruby Essence
Ruby Essence.description: Through these crimson fruits, I will gain eternal youth.

skill.description: Recovers {{variable}} of max Health at the beginning of the turn when the caster is debuffed.

Sword of the Morning.name: Sword of the Morning
Sword of the Morning.description:
Only those with the power to control their inner energy can wield this sword.
- Master Swordsman Rhynos

skill.description: Increases Attack and Speed by {{variable}} when Health is 50% or less.

Timeless Anchor.name: Timeless Anchor
Timeless Anchor.description:
They say that the ship held down with that anchor is able to endure all strong winds.
- Written by Louis [The Adventures of Louis Van Vrista, Pg. 51]

skill.description: {{variable}} chance to dispel one debuff when attacked.

Bloodbead Dagger.name: Bloodbead Dagger
Bloodbead Dagger.description: A dagger once used by an assassin that took many lives.

skill.description: Increases Critical Hit Damage by {{variable}}.

Deadly Sword.name: Deadly Sword
Deadly Sword.description: If you remove the sword from its sheath, you must kill someone with it. If you fail to do so, you will die.

skill.description: Increases Attack by {{variable}}.

Elf's Bow.name: Elf's Bow
Elf's Bow.description: A light and sturdy bow used by an elf from Dun Blyraia.

skill.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by {{variable}}.

Fairy's Grimoire.name: Fairy's Grimoire
Fairy's Grimoire.description: Take a good look at that spell book. The glowing letters that you find after a few pages are messages from fairies.

skill.description: Increases Effect Resistance by {{variable}}.

Firm Shield.name: Firm Shield
Firm Shield.description: They say that the wielder of this shield doesn't back down from any situation, no matter how terrifying.

skill.description: Increases Defense by {{variable}}.

Staff of Wisdom.name: Staff of Wisdom
Staff of Wisdom.description: A soul inside the staff will whisper ancient knowledge.

skill.description: Increases Effectiveness by {{variable}}.

Biting Wind Star.name: Biting Wind Star
Biting Wind Star.description: A throwing star that flies as fast as the wind straight at the enemy's weak point.

skill.description: Increases Critical Hit Damage by {{variable}}.

Demon's Pistol.name: Demon's Pistol
Demon's Pistol.description: Legend says that anyone shot by this gun will become cursed.

skill.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by {{variable}}.

Dream Scroll.name: Dream Scroll
Dream Scroll.description: Tell me what you want to dream. I can show you anything.

skill.description: Increases Effect Resistance by {{variable}}.

Enhanced Gauntlet.name: Enhanced Gauntlet
Enhanced Gauntlet.description: A specially reinforced gauntlet that does not break, even after being hit with several attacks.

skill.description: Increases Defense by {{variable}}.

Sword of the Sun.name: Sword of the Sun
Sword of the Sun.description: A mysterious sword containing the power of light that grants its wielder continuous vitality.

skill.description: Increases Attack by {{variable}}.

Venus Orb.name: Venus Orb
Venus Orb.description: If you keep this orb with you, Venus's blessing will be with you.

skill.description: Increases Effectiveness by {{variable}}.
